perks.name: Accelerated Healing
perks.description: The character heals faster than normal, requiring only three-quarters of the normal healing time.

perks.name: Acute Sense: Hearing
perks.description: The character has excellent hearing and gains +1 to Notice checks based on hearing.
perks.downside: Sudden loud noises can momentarily deafen the character.

perks.name: Acute Sense: Sight
perks.description: The character has sharp eyes and gains +1 to Notice checks based on vision.
perks.downside: Sudden bright lights can momentarily blind the character.

perks.name: Acute Sense: Smell/Taste
perks.description: The character has a sharp nose or palate and gains +1 to Notice checks based on smell or taste.

perks.name: Ambidextrous
perks.description: The character can use either hand without penalties.

perks.name: Animal Companion
perks.description: The character has a faithful animal companion that is well-trained and emotionally bonded.
perks.downside: The animal must be cared for, fed, and housed.

perks.name: Animal Kinship
perks.description: The character has a 'touch' with animals and gains +1 to Animal Handling or Riding skills.

perks.name: Authority
perks.description: The character represents authorities and has official powers within a jurisdiction.
perks.downside: Responsibilities and duties come with the authority.

perks.name: Common Sense
perks.description: The GM gives warnings when the character is about to do something foolish.

perks.name: Connections: Allies
perks.description: The character has allies willing to help even in dire circumstances.
perks.downside: Allies may call upon the character for help when needed.

perks.name: Connections: Contacts
perks.description: The character has contacts who can provide information or services.
perks.downside: Contacts expect payment or returned favors.

perks.name: Double Jointed
perks.description: The character can contort their body and gains +1 to escape restraints.

perks.name: Fake Identity
perks.description: The character has an alternate identity with documentation and background.
perks.downside: Requires time and money to maintain the alternate identity.

perks.name: Famous
perks.description: The character is well-known and can leverage their fame for assistance.
perks.downside: Lack of anonymity and possible unwanted attention.

perks.name: Favor
perks.description: Someone important owes the character a debt or favor.

perks.name: Immunity
perks.description: The character is immune to a specific drug, poison, or disease.
perks.downside: None unless immune to beneficial drugs.

perks.name: Influence
perks.description: The character has prestige and authority in a specific sphere.
perks.downside: May be targeted due to their position.

perks.name: Intuition
perks.description: The character gets hunches and insights even without obvious clues.
perks.downside: Failed intuition rolls can lead to poor guesses.

perks.name: Light Sleeper
perks.description: The character awakens at slight noises and can't be surprised while sleeping.
perks.downside: May have difficulty getting good sleep in noisy environments.

perks.name: Longevity
perks.description: The character ages more slowly and retains youthful appearance and energy.

perks.name: Lucky
perks.description: Once per session, can reroll a Fumble or reverse a modifier.

perks.name: Machine-Touch
perks.description: All machinery repair tasks are considered Complexity 1 regardless of device.

perks.name: Perfect Pitch
perks.description: The character has perfect pitch and gets +1 to music or sound-related tasks.

perks.name: Photographic Memory
perks.description: The character has exceptional recall ability.

perks.name: Quick Learner
perks.description: The character learns faster, reducing training time and XP costs.

perks.name: Radiation Resistance
perks.description: The character gets +1 to Health tests against radiation.

perks.name: Sense of Direction
perks.description: The character never gets lost and always knows their orientation.

perks.name: Sense of Time
perks.description: The character always knows the time and duration of events.

perks.name: Strong Immune System
perks.description: The character gets +1 to Health tests against diseases and drugs.
perks.downside: Resistance to beneficial drugs as well.

perks.name: Thick-Skinned
perks.description: The character adds 5 points to Stamina, increasing damage thresholds.

perks.name: Wealthy
perks.description: The character has significant financial resources.

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.description: The character is physically or psychologically dependent on a substance or behavior.

flaws.name: Age: Young
flaws.description: The character is a teenager or younger with limits on freedom and respect.

flaws.name: Age: Old
flaws.description: The character is elderly with possible physical limitations.
flaws.upside: May be respected for wisdom and experience.

flaws.name: Amnesiac
flaws.description: The character has no memory of their past.
flaws.upside: May have unknown allies or skills.

flaws.name: Animal Antipathy
flaws.description: Animals are disturbed by the character, causing -1 to Animal Handling.

flaws.name: Bad Luck
flaws.description: Once per game, an opponent may reroll a Fumble or reverse a modifier.

flaws.name: Beliefs
flaws.description: The character holds strong beliefs that may lead to ridicule or danger.

flaws.name: Bloodlust
flaws.description: The character always tries to kill opponents and won't surrender.

flaws.name: Code of Honor
flaws.description: The character follows a code that limits their actions.

flaws.name: Criminal Background
flaws.description: The character has a criminal history that continues to cause problems.

flaws.name: Curse
flaws.description: One aspect of the character's life continuously fails.

flaws.name: Debt
flaws.description: The character owes someone a substantial debt.

flaws.name: Dedicated
flaws.description: The character is dedicated to a cause that directs their actions.
flaws.upside: Others dedicated to the cause may help.

flaws.name: Dependent
flaws.description: The character must care for someone else.
flaws.upside: The dependent may be helpful in some situations.

flaws.name: Destitute
flaws.description: The character has no money or reliable income.

flaws.name: Flashbacks
flaws.description: The character has sudden flashbacks in stressful situations.

flaws.name: Goal
flaws.description: The character has an all-consuming goal that may be unattainable.

flaws.name: Heavy Sleeper
flaws.description: The character is difficult to awaken and gets -3 to notice dangers while sleeping.

flaws.name: Infamous
flaws.description: The character has a bad reputation.

flaws.name: Insomniac
flaws.description: The character cannot sleep well and suffers penalties from fatigue.

flaws.name: Lame (Temporary)
flaws.description: The character has a leg injury causing -1 to movement-related skills.

flaws.name: Lame (Permanent)
flaws.description: The character has a permanent disability causing -1 to movement-related skills.

flaws.name: Liar
flaws.description: The character often lies when it's advantageous.

flaws.name: Mythomaniac
flaws.description: The character cannot tell the truth and constantly invents stories.

flaws.name: Mechanical Ineptitude
flaws.description: All machinery tasks are considered Complexity 3 regardless of device.

flaws.name: Motion Sickness
flaws.description: The character gets sick from movement, with penalty equal to the rating.

flaws.name: Nemesis
flaws.description: The character has a long-time enemy. Cost is per nemesis' 10 CPs or SPs.
flaws.upside: The enemy of your enemy may help you.

flaws.name: Obligation
flaws.description: The character has duties they must fulfill.
flaws.upside: Contacts through the obligation may help.

flaws.name: One-Armed (Temporary)
flaws.description: The character is missing an arm temporarily.

flaws.name: One-Armed (Permanent)
flaws.description: The character is permanently missing an arm.

flaws.name: Paranoid
flaws.description: The character believes people are conspiring against them.

flaws.name: Phobia (Mild)
flaws.description: The character fears something and gets -1 penalty when exposed to it.

flaws.name: Phobia (Severe)
flaws.description: The character has an intense fear requiring a Willpower test to function at all.

flaws.name: Poor Sense: Hearing
flaws.description: The character has poor hearing and gets -1 to related Notice checks.

flaws.name: Poor Sense: Sight
flaws.description: The character has poor vision and gets -1 to related Notice checks.

flaws.name: Poor Sense: Smell/Taste
flaws.description: The character has poor smell/taste and gets -1 to related Notice checks.
flaws.upside: Can eat bad food without noticing.

flaws.name: Blind (Temporary)
flaws.description: The character is temporarily blind and cannot perform sight-based activities.

flaws.name: Blind (Permanent)
flaws.description: The character is permanently blind and cannot perform sight-based activities.

flaws.name: Deaf (Temporary)
flaws.description: The character is temporarily deaf and cannot perform hearing-based activities.

flaws.name: Deaf (Permanent)
flaws.description: The character is permanently deaf and cannot perform hearing-based activities.

flaws.name: Quirk
flaws.description: A small personality flaw that poses minor limitations (max -2 from Quirks).
flaws.upside: Adds character depth and roleplaying opportunities.

flaws.name: Radiation Vulnerability
flaws.description: The character gets -1 to Health tests against radiation.

flaws.name: Secret
flaws.description: The character has a dark secret that must remain hidden.

flaws.name: Sickly
flaws.description: The character has a serious ailment with various symptoms.

flaws.name: Slow Healing
flaws.description: The character needs 50% more time to heal from injuries.

flaws.name: Slow Learner
flaws.description: The character learns more slowly, increasing training time and XP costs.

flaws.name: Social Stigma
flaws.description: The character belongs to a group with a bad reputation.
flaws.upside: Other members of the group may provide assistance.

flaws.name: Split Personality
flaws.description: The character has multiple personalities with different mental attributes.

flaws.name: Thin-Skinned
flaws.description: The character subtracts 5 points from Stamina, decreasing damage thresholds.

flaws.name: Wanted
flaws.description: The character is being hunted by authorities or organizations.
flaws.upside: Others hunted by the same group may be helpful.

flaws.name: Weak Immune System
flaws.description: The character gets -1 to Health tests against diseases and drugs.
